name: ACGTheBestGamingPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Welcome to ACG. This skill allows for you to jump into the ACG podcast on gaming right from your Alexa device. ACG is one of the largest gaming reviewers on youtube and considered a leader in gaming critique and information
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
